entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -16.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 04:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -16.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -18.0°C
Wind: SSE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
